pages.title: Jade Vine Seeds
pages.text: The remaining energy of this plant from aeons ago is barely still perceptible. So light and vulnerable that you think any wrong move could breathe the last bit of life out of your fragile seed.$(br)$(italic)Will the history of this plant remain elusive to you forever?

pages.title: Nurturing
pages.text: Once almost a lost cause you now have an ace up your sleeve: With the help of the Spirit Instiller you are sure that you can breathe life back into the little seed.

pages.title: Planting & Growing
pages.text: Palid, fragile hanging plants, growing down fence blocks. Can only grow one stage per night and only when exposed to the night sky. Not used to the intense sunlight, they will die when exposed to it.

pages.title: Jade Petals
pages.text: Dropped when mostly grown. Also rarely germinated seeds.

pages.title: Moonstruck Nectar
pages.text: After many nights full bloom, if full moon. Collect with glass bottle/bowl. Great restorative properties. Used to repair tools. Can purify certain items. Required for 'damage proof' enchant. Drink for healing.
